div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1847 Kangra district, c. 140 km. NE of (524) Amritsar, Punjab, India, 1853 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: AR Menander Antimachus II Philoxenus Lysias Antialcidas Indian punch-marked Disposition: dispersed Cunningham, NC 1873, p. 209
